topics.body:
This one time I was on my computer and my father barges and says "Son, I am very disappointed at you. You killed that poor animal with over a hundred bullets. Our family name's on the line!" The I said  "Dad, you don't even sound like that. Your English grammar sucks. Remember?" Then I woke up.

Also, Shouldn't awful be better than awesome?
